sentences.english: Island group from the volcanic island and cays .
sentences.chinese: 島羣由火山島和珊瑚礁組成。

sentences.english: A group of volcanic islands and islets in the Caroline Islands of the western Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 貝勞太平洋西部加羅林羣島中的一組火山島和小島。

sentences.english: Finally consider the island of Krakatoa.
sentences.chinese: 最後不能不提一下喀拉喀托火山島。

sentences.english: The island was formed by volcanic eruption at a long time ago.
sentences.chinese: 是若干年前火山噴發型成的火山島。

sentences.english: The island is huge fissure eruption of adjacent formation volcanic island.
sentences.chinese: 各島是從洋底巨大裂隙噴發形成的火山島。
